nodes.text: Camm was a human male cadet who attended a flight academy of the Galactic Empire during it's reign. He wished to run away after repeatedly failing his simulator test, and asked fellow cadet Yrica Quell to run with him, who he had feelings for. Quell refused, fearing arrest and execution and also not liking Camm as much as he liked her. Around 5 ABY, Quell saw a vision of Camm while being subjected to force energies from an observatory.
Camm was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
